address.title: Address
address.text: Turkestan region, city of Turkestan 157th quarter, building number 037

about.title: Rest and wellness in healing waters
about.description:
The sanatorium "Altyn Too" is a paradise among the desert area of Turkestan. Locals often call this area an Oasis and dream of swimming in a luxurious pool. What can we say about the local mineral water, which has cured more than one thousand satisfied guests.

Due to the presence of unique natural healing factors and developed infrastructure, the qualified staff of the sanatorium will always find the optimal combination of effective treatment and pleasant rest for you.

A healthy balanced diet, comfortable living conditions, a wide range of SPA services and services will allow you to get an inexhaustible boost of energy, restore strength and prolong youth.
